sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BARPTLOG ( RPTNAME, QRYCONDITION, APNO, ISSUYM, PAYYM, CHKDATE, PAGE, FILENAME, PROCUSER, PROCTIME ) VALUES ( #rptName:VARCHAR#, #qryCondition:VARCHAR#, #apNo:VARCHAR#, #issuYm:VARCHAR#, #payYm:VARCHAR#, #chkdate:VARCHAR#, #page:NUMERIC#, #filename:VARCHAR#, #procuser:VARCHAR#, #proctime:VARCHAR# )
